description: Gets information about a SageMaker Partner AI App.

parameters.name: Arn
parameters.description: The ARN of the SageMaker Partner AI App to describe.

nested_items.name: Arn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the SageMaker Partner AI App that was described.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name of the SageMaker Partner AI App.

nested_items.name: Type
nested_items.description: The type of SageMaker Partner AI App. Must be one of the following: lakera-guard, comet, deepchecks-llm-evaluation, or fiddler.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The status of the SageMaker Partner AI App.

nested_items.name: CreationTime
nested_items.description: The time that the SageMaker Partner AI App was created.

nested_items.name: LastModifiedTime
nested_items.description: The time that the SageMaker Partner AI App was last modified.

nested_items.name: ExecutionRoleArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the IAM role associated with the SageMaker Partner AI App.

nested_items.name: KmsKeyId
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services KMS customer managed key used to encrypt the data at rest associated with SageMaker Partner AI Apps.

nested_items.name: BaseUrl
nested_items.description: The URL of the SageMaker Partner AI App that the Application SDK uses to support in-app calls for the user.

nested_items.name: MaintenanceConfig
nested_items.description: Maintenance configuration settings for the SageMaker Partner AI App.

nested_items.name: MaintenanceWindowStart
nested_items.description: The day and time of the week in Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) 24-hour standard time that weekly maintenance updates are scheduled. This value must take the following format: 3-letter-day:24-h-hour:minute. For example: TUE:03:30.

nested_items.name: Tier
nested_items.description: The instance type and size of the cluster attached to the SageMaker Partner AI App.

nested_items.name: Version
nested_items.description: The version of the SageMaker Partner AI App.

nested_items.name: ApplicationConfig
nested_items.description: Configuration settings for the SageMaker Partner AI App.

nested_items.name: AdminUsers
nested_items.description: The list of users that are given admin access to the SageMaker Partner AI App.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: Arguments
nested_items.description: This is a map of required inputs for a SageMaker Partner AI App. Based on the application type, the map is populated with a key and value pair that is specific to the user and application.
(string) ---
(string) ---

nested_items.name: AuthType
nested_items.description: The authorization type that users use to access the SageMaker Partner AI App.

nested_items.name: EnableIamSessionBasedIdentity
nested_items.description: When set to TRUE, the SageMaker Partner AI App sets the Amazon Web Services IAM session name or the authenticated IAM user as the identity of the SageMaker Partner AI App user.

nested_items.name: Code
nested_items.description: The error code for an invalid or failed operation.

nested_items.name: Reason
nested_items.description: The failure reason for the operation.
